com.desc.meetingbooker

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.desc.meetingbooker.MainActivity

  • public final class MainActivity
extends Activity
    An Activity that displays todays agenda, current/next meeting and all the links to the other activities
    Since:
    04-04-2013
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Carl Johnsen

    • Method Detail

      • editCurrent

        public final void editCurrent(View view)
        The method called if the user clicks on curNextLay. Does the same as the ListViews OnItemClickListener, except it sends along current as the selected event
        Parameters:
        view - The View of the layout

      • endMeeting

        public final void endMeeting(View view)
        The method called by the "EndMeeting" button. Changes the end time of the current event, to the current time, if the config allows if. If it does'nt, it adds the identifier "ended" to the description, and then sync() will change the background to yellow
        Parameters:
        view - The View from the button

      • newMeeting

        public final void newMeeting(View view)
        The method called by the "NewMeeting" button. Starts the NewEditActivity
        Parameters:
        view - The View from the button

      • settings

        public final void settings(View view)
        The method called by the settings button. It inflates a password prompt
        Parameters:
        view - The View of the button

      • startNextMeeting

        public final void startNextMeeting(View view)
        The method called by the "StartNextMeeting button". Changes the start time of the next event, to the current time.
        Parameters:
        view - The View from the button
